title: Google\Cloud\Firestore\V1beta1\Target
name: Target
description:
A specification of a set of documents to listen to.

Generated from protobuf message google.firestore.v1beta1.Target

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getResumeToken
methods.description:
A resume token from a prior [TargetChange][google.firestore.v1beta1.TargetChange] for an identical target.

Using a resume token with a different target is unsupported and may fail.

Generated from protobuf field bytes resume_token = 4;

methods.name: getReadTime
methods.description:
Start listening after a specific read_time.

The client must know the state of matching documents at this time.

methods.name: getTargetId
methods.description:
A client provided target ID.

If not set, the server will assign an ID for the target. Used for resuming a target without changing IDs. The IDs can either be client-assigned or be server-assigned in a previous stream. All targets with client provided IDs must be added before adding a target that needs a server-assigned id.

Generated from protobuf field int32 target_id = 5;

methods.description:

Generated from protobuf field int32 target_id = 5;
